org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.federation.policies.manager

类 AbstractPolicyManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.yarn.server.federation.policies.manager.AbstractPolicyManager
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FederationPolicyManager
    直接已知子类:
    HashBroadcastPolicyManager, PriorityBroadcastPolicyManager, RejectAllPolicyManager, UniformBroadcastPolicyManager, WeightedLocalityPolicyManager

    public abstract class AbstractPolicyManager
extends Object
implements FederationPolicyManager
    This class provides basic implementation for common methods that multiple policies will need to implement.

      This default implementation validates the FederationPolicyInitializationContext, then checks whether it needs to reinstantiate the class (null or mismatching type), and reinitialize the policy.

      This method returns the queue this policy is configured for.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAMRMPolicy

        public FederationAMRMProxyPolicy getAMRMPolicy(FederationPolicyInitializationContext federationPolicyContext,
                                               FederationAMRMProxyPolicy oldInstance)
                                        throws FederationPolicyInitializationException
        This default implementation validates the FederationPolicyInitializationContext, then checks whether it needs to reinstantiate the class (null or mismatching type), and reinitialize the policy.
        指定者:
        getAMRMPolicy 在接口中 FederationPolicyManager
        参数:
        federationPolicyContext - the current context
        oldInstance - the existing (possibly null) instance.
        返回:
        a valid and fully reinitalized FederationAMRMProxyPolicy instance
        抛出:
        FederationPolicyInitializationException - if the reinitalization is not valid, and ensure previous state is preserved

      • getRouterPolicy

        public FederationRouterPolicy getRouterPolicy(FederationPolicyInitializationContext federationPolicyContext,
                                              FederationRouterPolicy oldInstance)
                                       throws FederationPolicyInitializationException
        This default implementation validates the FederationPolicyInitializationContext, then checks whether it needs to reinstantiate the class (null or mismatching type), and reinitialize the policy.
        指定者:
        getRouterPolicy 在接口中 FederationPolicyManager
        参数:
        federationPolicyContext - the current context
        oldInstance - the existing (possibly null) instance.
        返回:
        a valid and fully reinitalized FederationRouterPolicy instance
        抛出:
        FederationPolicyInitializationException - if the reinitalization is not valid, and ensure previous state is preserved

      • serializeConf

        public SubClusterPolicyConfiguration serializeConf()
                                            throws FederationPolicyInitializationException
        从接口复制的说明: FederationPolicyManager
        This method is invoked to derive a SubClusterPolicyConfiguration. This is to be used when writing a policy object in the federation policy store.
        指定者:
        serializeConf 在接口中 FederationPolicyManager
        返回:
        a valid policy configuration representing this object parametrization.
        抛出:
        FederationPolicyInitializationException - if the current state cannot be serialized properly

      • getQueue

        public String getQueue()
        从接口复制的说明: FederationPolicyManager
        This method returns the queue this policy is configured for.
        指定者:
        getQueue 在接口中 FederationPolicyManager
        返回:
        the name of the queue.

      • setQueue

        public void setQueue(String queue)
        从接口复制的说明: FederationPolicyManager
        This methods provides a setter for the queue this policy is specified for.
        指定者:
        setQueue 在接口中 FederationPolicyManager
        参数:
        queue - the name of the queue.
